description: Arsenal transfer rumours: Matheus Cunha, Viktor Gyokeres
title: Arsenal transfer rumours: Matheus Cunha, Viktor Gyokeres
title_page: Arsenal transfer rumours: Matheus Cunha, Viktor Gyokeres - BBC Sport
maintext:
Arsenal could be a possible destination for Wolves striker Matheus Cunha, who has a Â£62.5m release clause, as new Gunners sporting director Andrea Berta helped sign the forward for Atletico Madrid in 2021. (Mail), external
Berta has also been a long-term admirer of Sporting striker Viktor Gyokeres and the 26-year-old Sweden forward is a prominent candidate as Arsenal look to bolster their attacking options. (Athletic - subscription required), external
